classScheduleInformation: Class Materials Fee of $35 required. A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule.Prerequisite: ARTF 103.
description: Theory and practice in the elements, processes and principles of design. Course content is organized under three headings: RESEARCH, an introduction to methods used in research-driven project; TIME, an examination of the formal and technical aspects of temporal media such as sound, video or animation; and 3D EXPLORATION, a process-driven exploration of three-dimensional space and form. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule.Prerequisite: ARTF 103.
label: Design II
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Graphic Design or Crafts or History of Art or Photography or Industrial Design or Painting or Sculpture or Art Education or Art Foundation or New Media major(s).
